title: Core Data Structures
description: Implement foundational data structures for beads, rigs, shadow beads, and the federated graph. These are required by all other components.

title: Phase 4: Enterprise Integration
description: JIRA and GitHub Issues bi-directional sync. Plugin architecture. Target: Q4 2026

title: Phase 2: The Mailroom
description: Agent Mail protocol implementation with file locking and human inbox. Target: Q2 2026

title: Implement Bead struct
description: Core bead structure with id, title, description, status, priority, issue_type, timestamps, dependencies. Matches beads JSONL schema.

title: Write integration tests
description: Test suite for multi-context aggregation, file locking protocol, git operations. Use temp dirs for isolation.
close_reason: Integration tests added (14 tests covering config, graph, cache, mail)

title: Implement plugin architecture
description: WASM-based plugin system for custom integrations (Linear, Asana, Trello). Define plugin API and lifecycle.

title: Implement Rig struct with Builder pattern
description: Rig configuration with path, remote, persona, prefix, auth_strategy. Use builder pattern for construction.

title: Implement GitHub Issues integration
description: GraphQL API integration with GitHub Issues. Discussion thread sync, discovery links via CODEOWNERS.

title: Implement JSONL parser/serializer
description: Parse and serialize beads JSONL format. Handle versioning and backwards compatibility.

title: TUI Enhancement: Full 4-View Dashboard
description: Complete TUI implementation: Kanban, Dependency Graph, Mail Inbox, Swarm Monitor views. Vim-style filtering and navigation.

title: Phase 1: The Reader
description: Read-only aggregation of multiple Boss repositories. CLI and basic TUI showing unified view. Target: Q1 2026
close_reason: Phase 1 Reader complete: CLI, Kanban TUI, multi-repo aggregation, SQLite cache, 374 beads from 4 repos

title: Implement git operations for Boss repos
description: Clone, fetch, and read .beads/ from remote Boss repositories using git2 or gix. Handle authentication per context.

title: Write documentation and examples
description: API docs, architecture.md, examples/ directory with sample configs and workflows.

title: Implement context filtering
description: Filter beads by context (@work, @personal), status, priority, tags. Support combined filters.

title: Implement file locking/mutex protocol
description: LOCK/UNLOCK message handling with TTL. File lock table in SQLite. Conflict resolution (WAIT, STEAL, ABORT).
close_reason: Implemented LockManager with TTL, conflict resolution, and expiration

title: Implement error types with thiserror
description: Define AllBeadsError enum covering config, git, storage, network, parsing errors. Implement Display and From conversions.

title: Phase 3: The Writer
description: Full write-back to Boss repos, legacy repo initialization, Sheriff daemon. Target: Q3 2026

title: Implement agent addressing
description: Address format: agent_name@project_id. Special addresses: human@localhost, all@project_id. Validation and routing.
close_reason: Implemented Address type with validation and routing

title: Implement config.yaml parser
description: Parse ~/.config/allbeads/config.yaml with contexts, agent_mail, and visualization settings. Use serde_yaml.

title: Implement config validation
description: Validate config on load: check paths exist, URLs are valid, auth tokens are set, no duplicate context names.

title: Implement legacy repo initialization
description: allbeads init --remote <url> command. Clone repo, inject .beads/, create initial Analysis bead. Support --janitor mode.

title: Configuration System
description: Implement multi-context configuration (~/.config/allbeads/config.yaml) supporting work/personal contexts with different authentication strategies.

title: Implement Sheriff daemon
description: Background daemon with event loop: Poll, Diff, Sync, External Sync, Mail Delivery. Runs continuously with tokio.

title: Implement Postmaster (Agent Mail server)
description: MCP Agent Mail protocol server. Message routing, delivery guarantees, persistent storage in SQLite (~/.config/allbeads/mail.db).
close_reason: Implemented Postmaster with SQLite persistence, message routing, lock integration

title: Set up logging with tracing
description: Configure tracing subscriber, structured logging to file and stderr. Support RUST_LOG env var.

title: Implement git write operations
description: Create commits, push to remote Boss repos. Handle merge conflicts gracefully. Respect authentication per context.

title: Add core Cargo dependencies
description: Add tokio, clap, serde, serde_json, serde_yaml, git2, rusqlite, ratatui, crossterm, anyhow, thiserror, tracing to Cargo.toml

title: Implement HTTP/IPC server for Agent Mail
description: Local HTTP server on configurable port or Unix socket. Handle concurrent requests with tokio.
close_reason: Implemented axum HTTP server with REST API for Agent Mail

title: Implement manifest parser
description: Parse manifests/default.xml with git-repo compatibility. Extract project definitions, annotations (persona, prefix, jira-project).

title: Implement Shadow Bead sync
description: Create Shadow Beads in Boss repo for Epic-level beads in member Rigs. Update status, maintain pointer URIs.

title: Set up Rust project structure
description: Create lib.rs, module structure matching PRD (sheriff/, boss_board/, graph/, manifest/, integrations/, storage/). Set up tests/

title: Implement BeadId and RigId newtypes
description: Create type-safe ID wrappers to prevent mixing up bead IDs and rig IDs. Use String internally with validation.

title: Implement Janitor agent workflow
description: Automated code analysis: scan for TODOs, FIXMEs, dead code, missing tests. Create beads for findings.

title: Implement JIRA integration
description: Bi-directional sync with JIRA. Polling/webhook ingress, status mapping egress. Use reqwest for REST API.

title: Implement BossContext struct
description: Represents a single Boss repository context (work/personal) with name, URL, auth strategy, and integrations.

title: Implement basic TUI with ratatui
description: Terminal UI with Kanban view showing aggregated beads. Color-coded context tags (@work, @personal). Vim-style navigation (j/k).
close_reason: Phase 1 complete: Kanban TUI with vim navigation, multi-repo aggregation, full read-only functionality

title: Implement authentication strategies
description: Support ssh_agent, gh_enterprise_token, and personal_access_token auth strategies for git operations.

title: Implement CLI with clap
description: Command-line interface: allbeads list, allbeads show <id>, allbeads ready. Support filtering by context, status, priority.

title: Implement FederatedGraph data structure
description: Graph containing beads, shadow beads, and cross-repo dependencies. Support querying by context, status, tags.

title: Implement ShadowBead struct
description: Shadow bead with pointer URI (bead://repo/id), mirrored status, summary, and cross-repo dependencies.

title: Implement Agent Mail inbox in TUI
description: Mail tab in TUI showing inbox with unread count. Support Reply, Approve/Deny, Break Lock actions.

title: Implement SQLite cache layer
description: Local cache of aggregated graph in ~/.config/allbeads/cache.db with WAL mode. Expire and refresh from remotes.

title: Implement multi-Boss repository aggregator
description: Read .beads/ directories from multiple Boss repos, aggregate into unified FederatedGraph. Respect context boundaries (work/personal).

title: Implement Message struct and types
description: Message types: LOCK, UNLOCK, NOTIFY, REQUEST, BROADCAST, HEARTBEAT. Serialization with serde.
close_reason: Message struct and types implemented with full serialization and tests
